plot: The Six Four Soldiers were a criminal organization built on drug trafficking, robbery and murder. They would eventually become one of the most notorious gangs in United States history.
title: The Blackest Days
plot_es: The Six Four Soldiers were a criminal organization built on drug trafficking, robbery and murder. They would eventually become one of the most notorious gangs in United States history.
